body: I just realized that this move constructor is incorrect. `std::move` will probably leave the original value of `other.*`, and they will be freed in the destructor. You should either use `std::swap` or set fields of `other` to `nullptr`.
body_html: I just realized that this move constructor is incorrect. std::move will probably leave the original value of other.*, and they will be freed in the destructor. You should either use std::swap or set fields of other to nullptr.
